line.text: In Sword, to bypass a set of sword objects. Bypassing an obstacle means to make it trafficable. Agents of the simulation becomes able to move through a bypassed obstacle with a limited speed of movement.

Area into which the subordinates must bypass retreived obstacles.

The commander agent issues the "Bypass obstacles within area" mission to the engineer platoons, with a sub-area as objective. Each subordinate perform its mission by reconnoitering its sub-area and then by bypassing objects considered as 'obstacles'.
The mission terminates when all subordinates has finished their mission.
